name: cute baby octopus toy
notes:
this cute baby octopus is made with a round body and eight tentacles.
it is destined to a child but it is so cute your may want to keep it on your shelve !


the pattern is very easy to follow with step-by-step pictures. you can try it as your first crochet work.
if you are used to crochet amigurumis you can download the shorter pattern without pictures.


**hook** 
this pattern can be worked with any hook you want. refer to your yarnâ€™s hook size recommendations and go one size smaller : it will give structure to your octopus.


**yarn** 
this pattern has been tested with worsted, bulky and aran yarn (10-12 ply). keep in mind the yarn you choose should be slightly bigger than your crochet size.
you will need 2 yarn colors :
-	main color : about 120-150m / 131-164 yards of yarn
-	secondary color : about 80-120m / 87-131 yards of yarn. you can use more than one secondary color to have multicolor tentacles.

in addition, you will need a bit of black and withe yarn for the eyes.


**other material**
fiberfill stuffing, 1 or 2 rattles (optional).


**techniques and stitches**
everything is explain in the pattern preambule : ch, mr, sl, sc, dc, hdc, tr, inc, inv dec
